oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Pvt. Elisha H. Simpson, Co. K, 4th Tenn. Cav., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The donor indicated that this was Lisha Simpson of Bradley County, Tennessee. However, the soldier is most likely Pvt. Elisha H. Simpson, Co. K, 4th Tenn. Cav., USA who hailed from Bledsoe County, Tennessee. Simpson enlisted in February 1864. The 4th served in Rousseau's Raid through Alabama and in the Atlanta and Tennessee Campaigns in 1864. In January 1865 they were sent to Louisiana. Simpson was discharged from the army in New Orleans due to measles on May 12, 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Simpson, Elisha H.
